Detailed Description

Pure virtual base class for Octarm 6 (Mar 2006) trajectory generators.

Objects of this class will be shutdown after manipulator is shutdown during system exit.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void OA6TraGen::reset (  OA6 *  manip = 0  )  [pure virtual]
 

Resets the trajectory generator to current setpoint from manipulator, if specified; or resets setpoint to zeros if no manipulator is specified.

Implemented in OA6NetTraGen.
